title: [K-12] Metaverse-Based Hybrid Mathematics Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of College-Level Foundational Mathematics (Calculus, Linear Algebra)
context.additional_context: A hybrid class environment utilizing metaverse platforms and digital devices, where students participate simultaneously in metaverse spaces and real-time lectures via mobile devices.

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively solve mathematical modeling problems in a metaverse environment.
Learners can explain calculus concepts using 3D visualization tools through a hybrid learning system.
Creation of a mathematics portfolio incorporating peer feedback in a shared space within a metaverse platform.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
